body_html: Ah, you are hitting this error bazelbuild/bazel#1463, it's already fixed at HEAD, but the fix is not included in 0.4.0. You can work around this by cloning the repo at C drive, or build Bazel from HEAD. And we'll have 0.4.1 release soon, sorry for the trouble.
body_text: Ah, you are hitting this error bazelbuild/bazel#1463, it's already fixed at HEAD, but the fix is not included in 0.4.0. You can work around this by cloning the repo at C drive, or build Bazel from HEAD. And we'll have 0.4.1 release soon, sorry for the trouble.
body: Ah, you are hitting this error https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/issues/1463, it's already fixed at HEAD, but the fix is not included in 0.4.0. You can work around this by cloning the repo at C drive, or build Bazel from HEAD. And we'll have 0.4.1 release soon, sorry for the trouble.
